sidebar.aboutMe: Hi, my name is Dario Varga and I'm a junior frontend developer. Welcome to my personal website!

aboutMe.aboutMe: I'm a frontend developer who likes to work in React and always looking forward to new opportunities that can improve my skillset. I built several web apps which you can check out on my Github or portfolio.

whatIDo.title: What I do
whatIDo.description: I'm bachelor graduate at FERIT Osijek and I also finished 1 year education for Frontend development at University of Algebra. Currently looking for job so I can learn and grow in the frontend field. Below is a quick overview of my main technical skill sets and technologies I use. Want to find out more about my experience? Check out my online resume and project portfolio.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Welcome to my online portfolio. These are my personal projects which you can check out live or see the code on my github.
portfolio.subtitle: My Projects

resume.title: Online Resume
resume.subtitle: Clicking on a button below you will get an insight into the entire CV.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text1: Interested in hiring me or just want to say hi? You can fill in the contact form below or send me an email to
contact.text2: Want to get connected? Follow me on the social channels below.
